documents.document: I am just happy now we didn't get a $50K covaris machine, we have a much cheaper and versatile one.

me no want to work. :(

@teh_aimee but kitty loves you. :) Maybe Ru loves kitty too. Heh, silly cat, is there a number on her collar? time to go home kitty.

@kaimatai so many good pubs in oxford. Have fun!
@droneale Have a great productive trip!
Duct tape to the rescue. https://t.co/uKFRqHnNEG
@GrrlScientist yikes! The best thing about moving to NZ & buying this house was it is unlikely that we’ll have to move countries again.
@GrrlScientist leave them, the sky and wifi, active I meant to add…she just asked for our passwords..
@GrrlScientist London. She also wanted us to leave our sky & wifi when we moved out. Strange lady! Moving countries is the worst, good luck!
@GrrlScientist ours asked us to paint the bathroom when we moved in.. never did of course.
Cleaning up the day after…so there was a bit of rum left in the bottle… not any more!
@surt_lab I saw a bobcat in the garden of a prof I was staying with at Tucson during a lab visit. It was the awesomest thing ever.
